column4: Does anyone have any help or direction for me to try and fix my Ubuntu 7.10 + geforce 6100 driver problems?
what is the nature of the problem ?

I installed the "suggested" restricted driver, and it runs for a few mins, but then the screen completely messes up so as that i cannot read anything on it... i have been trying that binarydriverhowto as well.. (well, i guess i will try more, if that is the only fix)
you can always revert to the vesa driver if you need to with sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg   from the recovery mode
